verses.verse: The oracle<WH9294> concerning the wilderness<WH4057> of the sea.<WH3220> As windstorms<WH5492> in the Negev<WH5045> sweep<WH2498> on, It comes<WH935> from the wilderness,<WH4057> from a terrifying<WH3372> land.<WH776>
